sentence.Network_cn: 汉语词汇是一个开放性的系统.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s (denoting the wording, as opposed to other elements, in a piece of writing): from Greek, literally word' (see lexicon)

entry.tran: （某一语言的）词汇（层），全部词汇
entry.def: In linguistics, the words of a language can be referred to as the lexis of that language.

means.word_mean: 1. all of the words in a language; all word forms having meaning or grammatical function
